executive_summary: Nattawut Intanai is an enthusiastic BI, Data Analytics, and Data Engineer with extensive experience in gathering and analyzing data to support business decisions. He has a proven track record in ETL operations, cloud data transfer, dashboard reporting, and user support, utilizing a variety of BI tools including Power BI, Tableau, and Azure. His educational background in Business Information Systems, coupled with ongoing studies at NIDA, enhances his analytical capabilities. Nattawut is eager to leverage his skills to empower users and improve business operations in a dynamic team environment.

fit_analysis.overall_assessment: Nattawut demonstrates a strong alignment with the requirements typically expected in BI and Data Engineering roles. His extensive experience with BI tools, ETL processes, and data visualization aligns well with the responsibilities outlined in the job description. However, without specific job title and responsibilities, it's challenging to assess the complete fit. Overall, he appears to be a solid candidate for roles focused on data analytics and business intelligence.

experience: Extensive experience in ETL operations and data integration
Proven ability to design and maintain BI solutions
Experience in cross-functional collaboration to gather requirements
notable_achievements: Successfully integrated data from on-premise systems to Google BigQuery using Talend
Optimized BI processes for efficiency and improved reporting speed
Maintained and supported user dashboards, enhancing user experience

experience_gaps: Leadership experience in managing BI teams
Exposure to more diverse BI tools beyond those listed
recommendations: Pursue certifications in advanced analytics or machine learning
Gain experience in leading BI projects or teams
Explore additional BI tools to broaden technical expertise

interesting_fact: Nattawut has experience in both data engineering and business intelligence, allowing him to bridge the gap between technical data processing and actionable business insights.
